body:
Thanks for working through all the lint and review issues! This looks good now, and will go out in the next deploy.

PS: You should associate your Mozilla email with your Github account and/or change your git client to commit with your Github email, so your commits are associated with your Github account here.

body_html:
Thanks for working through all the lint and review issues! This looks good now, and will go out in the next deploy.

PS: You should associate your Mozilla email with your Github account and/or change your git client to commit with your Github email, so your commits are associated with your Github account here.
